con:request.name: create-profile
Copy of create-profile

con:restRequest.name: create-profile
con:restRequest.con:request: { "udmSliceProfileId": "${Properties#profileId}", "plmnIdSets": [ { "plmnIdSetIdentifier": "Default", "nssai": { "defaultSingleNssais": [ { "nssai": { "sst": 2, "sd": "000002" }, "dnnListId": "Default" } ], "singleNssais": [ { "nssai": { "sst": 1, "sd": "000002" }, "dnnListId": "Default" } ] }, "dnnLists": [ { "dnnListId": "Default", "dnnDataList": [ { "dnn": "ims", "defaultDnnIndicator": true, "lboRoamingAllowed": false, "iwkEpsInd": true, "pduSessionTypes": { "defaultSessionType": "IPV4", "allowedSessionTypes": [ "IPV6", "IPV4V6" ] }, "sscModes": { "defaultSscMode": "SSC_MODE_1", "allowedSscModes": [ "SSC_MODE_2", "SSC_MODE_3" ] }, "qos5gProfile": { "qi5": 5, "arp": { "priorityLevel": 1, "preemptCap": "NOT_PREEMPT", "preemptVuln": "NOT_PREEMPTABLE" }, "priorityLevel": 1 }, "sessionAmbr": { "uplink": "1000 Gbps", "downlink": "950 Gbps" }, "charging3gppCharacteristics": "0000", "upSecurity": { "upIntegr": "PREFERRED", "upConfid": "PREFERRED" } }, { "dnn": "internet", "defaultDnnIndicator": true, "lboRoamingAllowed": false, "iwkEpsInd": true, "pduSessionTypes": { "defaultSessionType": "IPV4", "allowedSessionTypes": [ "IPV6", "IPV4V6" ] }, "sscModes": { "defaultSscMode": "SSC_MODE_1", "allowedSscModes": [ "SSC_MODE_2", "SSC_MODE_3" ] }, "qos5gProfile": { "qi5": 5, "arp": { "priorityLevel": 1, "preemptCap": "NOT_PREEMPT", "preemptVuln": "NOT_PREEMPTABLE" }, "priorityLevel": 1 }, "sessionAmbr": { "uplink": "1000 Gbps", "downlink": "950 Gbps" }, "charging3gppCharacteristics": "0000", "upSecurity": { "upIntegr": "PREFERRED", "upConfid": "PREFERRED" } }, { "dnn": "mqf", "defaultDnnIndicator": true, "lboRoamingAllowed": false, "iwkEpsInd": true, "pduSessionTypes": { "defaultSessionType": "IPV4", "allowedSessionTypes": [ "IPV6", "IPV4V6" ] }, "sscModes": { "defaultSscMode": "SSC_MODE_1", "allowedSscModes": [ "SSC_MODE_2", "SSC_MODE_3" ] }, "qos5gProfile": { "qi5": 5, "arp": { "priorityLevel": 1, "preemptCap": "NOT_PREEMPT", "preemptVuln": "NOT_PREEMPTABLE" }, "priorityLevel": 1 }, "sessionAmbr": { "uplink": "1000 Gbps", "downlink": "950 Gbps" }, "charging3gppCharacteristics": "0000", "upSecurity": { "upIntegr": "PREFERRED", "upConfid": "PREFERRED" } }, { "dnn": "Default", "defaultDnnIndicator": true, "lboRoamingAllowed": false, "iwkEpsInd": true, "pduSessionTypes": {
